Tonsillectomy - what to ask your doctor

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Tonsil removal - what to ask your doctor
QAPair.Answer: Your child may have throat infections and need surgery to remove the tonsils ( tonsillectomy ). These glands are located at the back of the throat. The tonsils and the adenoid glands can be removed at the same time. The adenoid glands are located above the tonsils, in the back of the nose. Below are some questions you may want to ask your child's health care provider or surgeon to care for your child after surgery.
